name: RAMPAGE64 #LOWREZJAM
description:
Update: Let´s boost the development of this game and buy it now!Yet another great game from mago and keldo! This time for the #lowrezjam. Unfortunately we ran totally out of time, so if you like this game and want to get some more updates, follow me. RAMPAGE64 INCREDIBLE ROAD RAGE ACTION COMING TO YOU WITH GROUND

  - 128x128 FOR HIGH END GAMING SYSTEMS (NEW FEATURE!!)
